fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
$BOND is an ERC-20 token. It will be used to stake in the system, and as a governance token when the governance module is launched. 

As it conforms to the ERC-20 standard, the $BOND token is tradeable on any exchange and storable on any wallet - allowing anyone in the world to access it.

You can read more about it [here](https://barnbridge.com/token-bond/)
